attributes.action: Make puppy farming illegal and a criminal offence
attributes.background:
Puppy farms are a money making machine only, the pups and parents are often if not always not cared for properly and end up with behavioural issues and other medical issues. locked in cages never seeing the light of day no love or human contact
ALL TO MAKE MONEY FROM MAN'S BEST FRIEND

rejection.details:
If you are concerned about dog breeding in general, you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/200245

If you are specifically concerned with puppy farms, you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/206734
